Title:
An expanded concept of Madisonia includes miscellaneous
species of Pleurothallidinae
Keywords:
Atlantic Rainforest; Neotropics; Nomenclature,
Systematics; Taxonomy
Abstract:
Previous taxonomic studies in Pleurothallidinae suggested
possible relations among miscellaneous species of long-repent, segmented
rhizomes, abbreviated ramicauls, few-flowered inflorescences, and
flowers with more or less connate sepals and trilobed lip. However, the
lack of phylogenetic information for most species prevented any further
conclusions or changes in their taxonomy. With this in view, we
performed phylogenetic analyses using nuclear (ITS) and plastid (matK,
psbD-trnT, rps16-trnQ, trnH-psbA, and trnS-trnG) markers
